com.user

Class UserServiceRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.user.UserServiceRouter

  • public class UserServiceRouter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to define the various routes the application can support. Routes supported include createUser, getAllUsers, getUser, updateUser and deleteUser.

    Each route makes use of the corresponding method from the singleton instance of MongoServiceProvider class to update the documents in mongodb corresponding to users

    Author:
    Kamal Dandamudi on 8/25/16.
